Example websites

Source: vignettes/examples.Rmd
examples.Rmd

The examples below illustrate the use of Distill for making websites. If you want to learn more about how the websites were created, each example includes a link to its source code.

RStudio AI Blog
Piping Hot Data
Before I Sleep
The Mockup
Michael Clark: Statistics, Data, Science
Matt Worthington
Open Source Football
Taras Kaduk
RStudio Education: Teaching in Production

distill is a part of rmarkdown.io, an ecosystem of packages for creating computational documents in R. Learn more at rmarkdown.io.

Developed by JJ Allaire, Rich Iannone, Yihui Xie. Site built with pkgdown.
